content: finished size is 12 cm difficulty level is beginner materials needed green plush yarn wolans bunny baby/ yarnart chenille 1 skei 5 mm crochet hoo holofibe 7-8 mm plastic eye transparent moment glu a bit of pink yarn yarnart jeans 20 cm max a bit of black yarn yarnart jeans 20 cm max wide eye sewing needle abbreviations chain - chai magic_ring - magic rin single_crochet - single croche increase - increas decrease - decreas slip_stitch - slip_stitch the body 1 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 6 2 6 increase 12 hands 3 1 single_crochet increase *6 18 1 3 single_crochet in magic_ring 3 4 2 single_crochet increase *6 24 2 single_crochet around 3 5 3 single_crochet increase *6 30 6 4 single_crochet increase *6 36 7 5 single_crochet increase *6 42 8-10 single_crochet around 42 legs 11 5 single_crochet decrease *6 36 1 4 single_crochet in magic_ring 4 12 4 single_crochet decrease *6 30 2 single_crochet around 4 13 3 single_crochet decrease *6 24 14 2 single_crochet decrease *6 18 15 1 single_crochet decrease *6 12 16 decrease till the end eyes 1 4 single_crochet in magic_ring 4 2 1 single_crochet increase *2 6 assembly sew eyes first it should be between 3 and 8 row with 5-6 single_crochet between them a bit closer to back of the head glue the plastic eyes closer to head and in the middle make the mouth and cheeks with cotton and acryl yarn for the mouth divide the yarn on two then sew the hands between 9 and 13 row if count from the top of the frog closer to front with 12 single_crochet between them and legs between 2 and 6 row if count from the bottom with 4 single_crochet between them please do not share any parts of this pattern and send the link if you want to show it to someone thank you
